TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit FindCriteria extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Represents the criteria to use when searching for services.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] using FindCriteria and the Find operation, see [Discovery Find and FindCriteria](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Creates a new instance of the .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Type contractType) cil managed

Docs.param: The name of the contract type to search for.
Docs.summary: Creates a new instance of the class with the specified name of a contract type.
Gets the collection of contract type names to search for.
Docs.value: The contract type names to search for.

remarks.format: ## Remarks If more than one contract name is specified, only service endpoints matching ALL contracts will reply.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.ServiceModel.Discovery.FindCriteria CreateMetadataExchangeEndpointCriteria() cil managed

Docs.summary: Creates metadata exchange endpoint criteria to use when searching for services.
Docs.returns: The endpoint criteria to use to find services.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.ServiceModel.Discovery.FindCriteria CreateMetadataExchangeEndpointCriteria(class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName> contractTypeNames) cil managed

Docs.param: A collection of enumerations that represent contract type names.
Docs.summary: Creates an object that contains metadata exchange endpoint criteria derived from the specified collection of XML qualified names.
Docs.returns: The endpoint criteria to use to find services.

remarks.format: ## Remarks An <xref:System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName> is a namespace-qualified local name in the format of `namespace:localname`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.ServiceModel.Discovery.FindCriteria CreateMetadataExchangeEndpointCriteria(class System.Type contractType) cil managed

Docs.summary: Creates an object that contains metadata exchange endpoint criteria derived from the specified contract type.
Docs.returns: The endpoint criteria to use to find services.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.FindCriteria> information is used to create an endpoint that can search for services.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a <xref:System.TimeSpan> that specifies the find operation time-out period.
Docs.value: The time-out period of the find operation.

Docs.summary: Gets a collection of extensions in the instance.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool IsMatch(class System.ServiceModel.Discovery.EndpointDiscoveryMetadata endpointDiscoveryMetadata) cil managed

Docs.param: The endpoint discovery metadata that describes the service in question.
Docs.summary: Determines whether a set of criteria matches the service described by the specified instance.
Docs.returns: if the service matches the criteria, otherwise .

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the maximum number of responses required from the find operation.
Docs.value: The maximum number of response required from the find operation.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a URI that specifies how scopes are matched.
Docs.value: The URI that specifies how scopes are matched.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Uri ScopeMatchByExact

Docs.summary: Specifies that scopes are matched by using a case-sensitive comparison (http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2004/10/discovery/strcmp0) as defined by the [WS-Discovery Specification](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=122347).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Uri ScopeMatchByLdap

Docs.summary: Specifies that scopes are matched by using the LDAP method (http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2004/10/discovery/ldap) as defined by the [WS-Discovery Specification](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=122347).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Uri ScopeMatchByNone

Docs.summary: Specifies that scopes are ignored as defined by the [WS-Discovery Specification](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=122347).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Uri ScopeMatchByPrefix

Docs.summary: Specifies that scopes are matched using the prefix method (http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2004/10/discovery/rfc2396) as defined by the [WS-Discovery Specification](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=122347).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Uri ScopeMatchByUuid

Docs.summary: Specifies that scopes are matched by using the UUID method (http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2004/10/discovery/uuid) as defined by the [WS-Discovery Specification](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=122347).
Gets a collection of absolute URIs that represents scopes used to search for a service.
Docs.value: A collection of absolute URIs used to search for a service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks If more than one scope is specified, only service endpoints matching ALL scopes will reply.
